Overview¶

Contents

  • Overview
    • Why bother using pytraj?
    • What does pytraj offer?
    • How to get started
    • Contributors
    • Citations

pytraj is a Python front-end package of the popular cpptraj program.

Why bother using pytraj?¶

If you want to extend cpptraj’s functionanity to Python eco-system such as numpy, scipy, pandas, sklearn and many more. Check some examples here

What does pytraj offer?¶

  • support many types of analysis

  • support parallel processing

  • able to handle many files at the same time

  • able to handle very large trajectory

  • simple (and fast) calculation:

    import pytraj as pt
traj = pt.iterload('traj.nc', 'my_parm.top')
pt.radgyr(traj)
  • include many cpptraj features
    • automatic file detection by its content
    • smart autoimage function for PBC simulation.
    • ... (to be filled soon)

  • able to be used in other langues, such as Julia

How to get started¶

  • check installation
  • do some Tutorials
  • check a list of things pytraj/cpptraj can do

Contributors¶

A list of contributors

Citations¶

if you would like to acknowledge our works, please do consider citing both cpptraj and pytraj papers

PTRAJ and CPPTRAJ : Software for Processing and Analysis of Molecular Dynamics Trajectory Data
Daniel R. Roe and Thomas E. Cheatham, III
Journal of Chemical Theory and Computation 2013 9 (7), 3084-3095

pytraj (https://github.com/Amber-MD/pytraj), Hai Nguyen,  et al. (2015) (in preperation)
